text: Reaver of the Nine Wastes
The mighty Zar of the Kul Tribe traverses the Nine Wastes eagerly searching for his next victim.
The warriors of the Kul Tribe are known for cutting out any tooth, bone or limb for their victims to carry as prizes.
Trophy Collectors
The Kurgans of the Kul worship not only the Chaos Gods, but a variety of sinister lesser daemons - each with their own vile ambitions.
Dark Faith
The Horn of the Kul is made out of twisted concrete metal, carrying it is a feat in it's own right.
Horn of the Kul
Unusual amongst the hordes of Chaos are those who master the spear, the Kul however operate these long weapons if they were daggers.
Spear's Fury
For the Kul, Chaos Spawns are considered those worthy enough to have been touch by the Gods.
Touch of Embrace
To recieve mutations is to have been deemed worthy in the eyes of the ever watching Chaos Gods.
Welcome Mutations
The Kul Tribe are the most verocious of all the Northern Tribes, murdering and pillaging wherever they travel.
The Kul Tribe
The Kurgan collect ancient runestones who have withstood men's mere existence. They are said to carry vile and chaotic magic.
Kurgan Runestones
Legendary Lord
Ability: "Reaver of the Wastes''
The Crashed Crow
No nay never will he play the reaving crow no more..
Defeated Akkorak the Crow

Amidst the desolation of the Eastern Steppes, Kurgan lord Akkorak the Crow wielded the Reaver of the Wastes. Forged from the bones of ancient behemoths, its sharp tip sang the haunting melody of forgotten empires. As Akkorak charged, the spear cleaved through the air like the wings of carrion crows, rewriting the annals of the desolate steppes with each relentless strike. Legends spoke of the nomadic lord, a silhouette against the vast expanse, carrying the echoes of conquest on the Spear of the Wastes.
Spear of the Wastes
Akkorak the Crow
the Crow
Akkorak
Arguably the most ruthless tribes amongst the Northern people, the Zar of the Kul must proof his standing by constantly performing despicable acts.
The Reaver of the Wastes has soaked the blood of warriors hailing from all Northern tribes.
Reaver of the Wastes
Akkorak the Crow
Akkorak the Crow
Ability: "Riders of the Kul'' for Horseback units
The chaos riders of the Kul are considered the scourge of the nine wastes, they're devilish horses in a constant chaotic infused frenzy.
